weight: Approx. 306g/10.8 oz.(excluding accessories, batteries and memory card)
exposuremode: Programmed AE, Aperture Priority AE, Shutter Priority AE, Manual
powersupply: 4xAA type alkaline batteries(included)/ 4xAA type Ni-MH rechargeable batteries(optional) or AC power adapter AC-5VX(optional)
playbackfunctions: Slide show, Trimming, Single frame, 9 Multi-frame playback , Sorting by date, Image rotate, Voice Memo, Histograms (Highlight warning)
flash: Auto flash (Auto pop up) Effective range: (ISO AUTO(800)): approx. 0.5 – 6.2m /1.6 – 20.3 ft Macro: approx. 0.3m ‘” 3m / 1.0 ft – 9.8 ft. Red-eye Reduction + Slow Synchro.
photographyfunctions: High speed shooting, Best framing, Post shot assist windows, Frame No. memory, Automatic playback, Histograms
aperture: F3.5- F13.6, 7 steps in 1/3 EV increment
movierecording: 640 x 480 pixels, 30 frames/sec. 320 x 240 pixels, 30 frames/sec. With monaural sound, With Electronic Image Stabilization
focusdistance: Normal : Wide angle :Approx. 30cm/1.0 ft to infinity Telephoto: Approx. 1m/3.3 ft to infinity Macro: Wide Angle: Approx. 4cm/1.6 in. to 3m/9.8 ft. Telephoto: Approx. 60cm/2.0 ft. to 3m/9.8 ft. Super Macro: Approx 1cm /0.4 in. to 1m /3.3 ft.
sensitivity: Auto / Auto(800)/ Auto(400)/ Equivalent to 64/100/200/400/800/1600 (Standard Output Sensitivity)
accessoriesincluded: 4xAA type Alkaline batteries Shoulder strap Lens cap Lens cap cord USB cable A / V cable CD-ROM: FinePixViewer Owner’s Manual
focus: Auto focus (Area, Multi, Center)/Continuous AF/ Manual focus AF assist illuminator available
lens: Fujinon 10x Optical Zoom lens , F3.5 – F3.7
electronicviewfinder: 0.24-inch, approx.230,000 pixels color LCD monitor, approx. 97% coverage, 60fps
numberofrecordedpixels: Still image: 3,072 x 2,304 / 3,072 x 2,048 (3:2 format) / 2,304 x 1,728 /1,600 x 1,200 / 640 X 480 pixels Movie: 640 x 480 pixels (30 frames/sec.), 320 x 240 pixels (30 frames/sec.) with monaural sound
lcdmonitor: 2.5-inch , approx.230,000 pixels, low-temperature polysilicon TFT color LCD monitor, approx. 97% coverage, 60fps
shutterspeed: 4 sec. to 1/1000 sec. (depend on Shooting mode)
lensfocallength: f=6.33mm – 63.3mm, Equivalent to 38-380mm on a 35mm camera
shootingmodes: Mode dial : Auto, Picture Stabilization Mode, Natural Light, Natural Light & with Flash, SP1, SP2, P, A, S, M, Movie SP1/SP2: Portrait, Landscape, Sport, Night, Fireworks, Sunset, Snow, Beach, Museum, Party, Flower, Text
whitebalance: Automatic scene recognition Preset (Fine, Shade, Fluorescent light (Daylight), Fluorescent light (Warm White), Fluorescent light (Cool White), Incandescent light), Custom
optionalaccessories: xD-Picture Card™: 256MB, 512MB, 1GB, 2GB Rechargeable Battery 2HR-3UF(2xAA type Ni-MH) Battery Charger with Battery(2xAA type Ni MH) BK-NH/BK-NH2 AC Power Adapter AC-5VX PC Card Adapter DPC-AD CompactFlash™ Card Adapter DPC-CF
fileformat: Still image : JPEG (Exif Ver 2.2 ) Movie : AVI (Motion JPEG ) with sound Audio: WAVE format, Monaural sound (Design rule for Camera File system compliant / DPOF-compatible)
